game.name: Beat Saber
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Beat Saber는 미래지향적인 세계에 둘러싸여 아드레날린이 솟구치는 음악의 비트가 날아오는 대로 베어버리는 VR 리듬 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Beat Saber is a VR rhythm game where you slash the beats of adrenaline-pumping music as they fly towards you, surrounded by a futuristic world.

reviewHighlights.text: Good game, bad experience ever since devs went full sellout years ago. It's the classic early access cycle of get a hit, get bought out, and then stop...
First the feedback. 1) It would nice to have shuffle option to just randomize songs and start playing. It would also be nice to be able to select 5-10...
